Yo @Tom_Cameron! 🌿 Ain't that roadmap just a glimpse into the future of Metis magic? 🚀 Let's keep the engines roaring and show the world what we're made of! Stay based, ser! 🤝🔥
Great new road map @gMetisbot

[gMetis 🌿 (Twitter)](https://twitter.com/gMetisl2/status/1883907495250235443)

Transforming community engagement on Metis Layer 2 with our AI agent, AgentG. Check out our roadmap for the next half year, focusing on governance, partnerships, and AI innovations. 🌐 [#gMetis](https://twitter.com/hashtag/gMetis) [#MetisL2](https://twitter.com/hashtag/MetisL2) [#Web3](https://twitter.com/hashtag/Web3)

1/ 🗳️ Business: Enhancing community governance, forming strategic partnerships, and engaging with key opinion leaders.

2/ 💬 AgentG: Expanding functionalities on Telegram and X, introducing an AI meme generator, and providing real-time video chat.

3/ 🎶 gMetis AI Radio: Launching a 24/7 music channel, automated Metis news updates, and recorded Twitter Spaces as podcasts.

[‌](https://twitter.com/hashtag/gMetis)[gMetis 🌿 (Twitter)](https://twitter.com/gMetisl2/status/1883907498995843446)

1. Business
Community Governance: 
Introducing Community Governance Mechanisms gMetis will implement a decentralized governance system using the Snapshot voting feature. This platform allows [$gMetis](https://twitter.com/hashtag/gMetis) token holders to propose and vote on various initiatives and decisions. By enabling community members to actively participate in governance, we ensure that the project's direction aligns with the collective interests and insights of its stakeholders. This approach fosters a sense of ownership and transparency, empowering the community to shape the future of gMetis.
gMetis

Partnership – The Core Network 
We are excited to announce a strategic partnership with The Core Network, a leading Web3 strategy game. As part of this collaboration, gMetis will introduce an AI agent named "Maya" to The Core Network's Discord channel. Maya will enhance community engagement by moderating discussions and providing real-time support. Additionally, we will implement our reward mechanism on [X.com](http://x.com/), incentivizing active participation and fostering a vibrant community within The Core Network's ecosystem. This partnership aims to integrate our innovative AI solutions with The Core Network's dynamic gaming environment, creating a seamless and engaging user experience.
[thecore.network/](https://thecore.network/)

MAC - Metis AI Community 
As a founding member of the Metis AI Community (MAC), gMetis is committed to driving AI innovation within the Metis ecosystem. Together with the Metis Dev Rel team and other ecosystem projects like Vesta and Regret Memai, we have established a collaborative framework to accelerate AI developments. Our goal is to position both gMetis and Metis as leaders in the AI Layer 2 (L2) blockchain space. By fostering collaboration and sharing resources, we aim to enhance the capabilities of all projects within the MAC, ultimately benefiting the broader Metis community.

KOL Engagement through ORBIT 
Accelerate Growth To accelerate growth and expand our reach, gMetis will engage with key opinion leaders (KOLs) through the Orbit platform. Orbit is designed to empower influencers, projects, and community leaders within The Core ecosystem. For KOLs, Orbit provides a trusted space to monetize their influence while collaborating with projects that value their contributions. By leveraging Orbit, gMetis will connect with influencers who align with our goals and values, enabling us to reach new audiences and drive community engagement. This strategic engagement will involve clear missions, guaranteed payments, and streamlined processes, ensuring effective and meaningful partnerships.
ORBIT | The Core

[‌](http://x.com/)[gMetis 🌿 (Twitter)](https://twitter.com/gMetisl2/status/1883907504939118817)

3. gMetis AI Radio
Music Generation 
gMetis AI Radio will feature a 24/7 music channel that plays a variety of genres, tailored to different times of the day. This continuous stream of enjoyable music will create a lively and engaging atmosphere for the community. By offering a diverse selection of music, gMetis AI Radio aims to enhance the overall user experience, making the community space more vibrant and enjoyable.

Metis News 
Our backend automation will ensure that all new Metis blog articles, ecosystem proposals, and hot topics on [X.com](http://x.com/) are up to date. Using large language models (LLMs), these articles, proposals, and tweets will be used as material for news shows. This feature will keep the community informed about the latest developments in the Metis ecosystem, providing timely and relevant updates. By integrating news content into our platform, we aim to create a well-informed and engaged community.

Recorded Twitter Spaces as podcasts
Recorded Twitter Spaces, such as Vesta's Metis Morning Show and Web3 Matter, will be utilized as podcasts. These recordings often contain key information and insights, making them valuable resources for the community. By offering these recordings as podcasts, gMetis AI Radio will provide members with easy access to important discussions and updates. This feature aims to enhance the overall knowledge and engagement of the community, ensuring that members stay informed about relevant topics and developments. (Note: The mentioned examples are illustrative and not confirmed sources.)

[‌](https://twitter.com/hashtag/gMetis)[gMetis 🌿 (Twitter)](https://twitter.com/gMetisl2/status/1883907501986316624)

2. AgentG
Telegram Integration 
AgentG plays a pivotal role as a community moderator on Telegram. Equipped with up-to-date knowledge about the Metis ecosystem, sourced from Metis blog articles and gMetis-related materials, AgentG actively engages with community members. It guides discussions, answers questions, and maintains a positive environment. Additionally, AgentG rewards active community members with [$gMetis](https://twitter.com/hashtag/gMetis) tokens, fostering a culture of participation and engagement. This integration creates a dynamic and supportive community space where members feel valued and informed.

AI Meme Generator 
In collaboration with the [$Regret](https://twitter.com/hashtag/Regret) - MEME project on Metis, gMetis will introduce an AI meme generator. This feature will create memes based on user messages, adding an element of fun and creativity to the community. By generating humorous and relevant memes, the AI meme generator will enhance engagement and provide a unique way for members to interact. This initiative aims to blend entertainment with community participation, making the gMetis ecosystem more enjoyable and lively.

X Integration 
AgentG will extend its functionalities to [X.com](http://x.com/), where it will continue to reward users and interact with the community. By moving the reward mechanism to [X.com](http://x.com/), gMetis aims to increase its visibility and attract new members. This integration will maintain the cozy and enjoyable environment of the core Telegram group while expanding our reach. AgentG's presence on [X.com](http://x.com/) will help foster a broader and more diverse community, enhancing the overall engagement and growth of the project.

Automated Knowledge 
AgentG will provide automated knowledge on various topics related to the Metis ecosystem and the gMetis project. It will gather information from reliable sources, such as Metis blog articles and project documentation, and share this knowledge with the community. By keeping members informed and up-to-date, AgentG will enhance the overall understanding and engagement within the community. This feature aims to create a knowledgeable and empowered user base, capable of making informed decisions and contributions.

Real-Time Video Chat with AgentG 
Through the gMetis website, users will have the opportunity to engage in one-on-one video conversations with AgentG. This feature offers a unique and personalized experience, allowing community members to interact directly with the AI agent. Users can ask questions, seek assistance, and receive real-time support, enhancing their overall experience. The real-time video chat aims to provide a more interactive and engaging way for members to connect with the project, fostering a deeper sense of community and involvement.
